SKT_FIRST.name: Lunch Special
SKT_FIRST.true_desc: Attacks an enemy and has a <color=#28d9ed>30%</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Burned</color> on the target for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_jp: 敵単体にダメージを与え、対象に<color=#28d9ed>30%</color>の確率で<color=#28d9ed>火傷</color>を<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間付与する。
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_kr: 적을 공격하고 <color=#28d9ed>30%</color> 확률로 대상에게 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 <color=#28d9ed>화상</color>을 부여합니다.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_zh: 攻击敌人,并有<color=#28d9ed>30%</color>的几率对目标造成<color=#28d9ed>烧伤</color>效果,持续<color=#28d9ed>2回合</color>。

SKT_BURST_3.effect_jp: 火傷強化\n(効果抵抗無視)
SKT_BURST_3.effect_zh: 强化烧伤\n(无视效果抵抗)

SKT_SECOND.name: Smoky Fried Dish
SKT_SECOND.true_desc: Attacks an enemy. Performs an <color=#28d9ed>additional attack</color> on the same target if the target is inflicted with <color=#28d9ed>Burned</color>.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_jp: 敵単体にダメージを与え、対象が<color=#28d9ed>火傷</color>状態の場合、<color=#28d9ed>追加攻撃</color>を与える。
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_kr: 적을 공격하고 대상이 <color=#28d9ed>화상</color> 상태라면 동일한 대상에게 <color=#28d9ed>추가 공격</color>을 사용합니다.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_zh: 攻击敌人,若目标处于<color=#28d9ed>烧伤</color>状态,则对相同目标发动<color=#28d9ed>额外攻击</color>。

2_jp: スキル使用時、命中UP+2ターン
2_zh: 使用技能时命中提升+2回合

SKT_ULTIMATE.name: Fine Dining
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_jp: 敵単体にダメージを与える。\n対象の<color=#28d9ed>火傷</color>をすべて<color=#28d9ed>破裂</color>させる。
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_zh: 攻击敌人。\n使目标受到的<color=#28d9ed>烧伤</color>效果全部<color=#28d9ed>爆炸</color>。

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.name: Chain Passive
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc: <color=#ffd732>Chain Companion Effect</color>: After attacking, recovers <color=#28d9ed>25</color> Action Points.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>50%</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Burned</color> on the target for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_jp: <color=#ffd732>チェーン効果(汎用)</color>:攻撃後、APを<color=#28d9ed>25</color>獲得する。\n\n<color=#ffd732>連携効果</color>:攻撃後、対象に<color=#28d9ed>50%</color>の確率で<color=#28d9ed>火傷</color>を<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間付与する。
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_kr: <color=#ffd732>체인 컴패니언 효과</color> : 공격 후 <color=#28d9ed>25</color>의 AP를 회복합니다.\n\n<color=#ffd732>협공 효과</color> : 공격 후 적 대상에게 <color=#28d9ed>50%</color> 확률로 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 <color=#28d9ed>화상</color>을 부여합니다.
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_zh:
<color=#ffd732>连携技能自由顺序效果</color>:攻击后,使AP恢复
<color=#28d9ed>25</color>。

<color=#ffd732>夹攻效果</color>:攻击后,有<color=#28d9ed>50%</color>的几率对敌人目标造成<color=#28d9ed>烧伤</color>效果,持续<color=#28d9ed>2回合</color>。

2: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
2_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
3: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
3_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
4: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage

5: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
